creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The link drawer appears, but when I click on "Sitetree links", I get a
JavaScript alert box with an error message.

SocketListener0-8 ERROR sitemap.handled-errors - Error during resolving of the
input stream
	at <map:read> -
file:/Users/nobby/apache/lenya/trunk/build/lenya/webapp/global-sitemap.xmap:103:75
	at <map:mount> -
file:/Users/nobby/apache/lenya/trunk/build/lenya/webapp/sitemap.xmap:647:106
SocketListener0-9 ERROR sitemap.handled-errors - No pipeline matched request:
default/authoring/index.html
	at <map:mount> -
file:/Users/nobby/apache/lenya/trunk/build/lenya/webapp/global-sitemap.xmap:316:105
	at <map:mount> -
file:/Users/nobby/apache/lenya/trunk/build/lenya/webapp/sitemap.xmap:647:106
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: The "Sitetree links" item occurs twice in the links drawer.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: I updated the code to the new API.
creator: andreas@apache.org
